title.rendered: Spectator Information for SSCSD Athletic Events

content.rendered:
Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with the current spectator guidelines at Saratoga Springs. Please understand we are continuing to monitor the evolving pandemic situation and our spectator guidelines can change at any time. Any changes in expectations will be communicated to our families.

Indoor Events:

  • Currently, there is no limit for the number of spectators that can attend indoor sporting events at Saratoga Springs
  • All teams and spectators are encouraged to maintain social distancing
  • All indoor events require teams and spectators to wear a mask
  • All attendees are strongly encouraged to sanitize before entering any of our facilities
  • Rules for spectators vary by school in the Suburban Council and in Section 2. It is best to contact the coach or Athletics office for clarification before traveling to an indoor event that is not hosted by Saratoga Springs

Outdoor Events:

  • Currently, there is no limit for the number of spectators that can attend outdoor sporting events at Saratoga Springs
  • All teams and spectators should maintain social distancing to the best of their ability
  • Masks are optional at outdoor events for those that can maintain 3ft of distance. If spectators are unable to maintain distancing, a mask is required

*Dogs are not permitted on our campus during any practice and/or competition. Spectators that show up with dogs will be asked to leave the facility, immediately. Please understand that not everyone is comfortable with dogs and that dog waste is not good for our grounds. This will be an expectation at all other Suburban Council and Section 2 schools.
